title: My "Your Shop" disappeared.
body:
I tried to open my "Your Shop", but got a queue for a game at the same time so I couldn't open it.
When my game ended my shop just disappeared. The icon itself that leads for the shop is gone from my home page.
https://gyazo.com/c329c9b9c7af88b7868ed0ce249b63bf 
??

replies.body: Hmmmm I'm just now seeing this as an issue for the first time, but so far it seems like refreshing League should make that My Shop button pop back up for you. Give it a try and let me know if that works ^_^!

Same issue with me. I tried refreshing. Restarted the client. I accessed MY SHOP and got all the skins that I want at a heavy discount. I wanna buy them now but the shop icon just isn't showing up no matter how many times I restart my client! I hope this gets resolved before the MY SHOP is officially gone! I WANT THOSE SKINS! {{item:3070}}

The same thing happened to me except I didn't have it open in queue. What actually happened was I got discounts for champions I never used except for one Alistar skin which I bought. Then after a game the shop disappeared and I couldn't get it back until today. This time, my shop has completely different discounts. Before I had 2 Trundle skins, a Brand skin, a Malzahar skin, and an Alistar skin. This time I have a Yasuo skin, a riven skin, a Warwick skin, a Tristana skin, and a Rengar skin. All of which I have level 6 or above in mastery. It's a bit odd but at least I got the discounted Alistar skin while it was there.
